  1. News & Trending Topics


    Latest news and highlights

  1. Liberty Park Gazebo Closure

    Beginning Tuesday, September 16, 2025, the Liberty Park Gazebo will be temporarily closed to the public to support the relocation of the floating docks previously located at Wallace Brooks Park. Read on...

  2. Cooter Carnival

    Back by popular demand, the beloved Cooter Carnival returns on October 12th! Join us for a day of family-friendly carnival fun! Read on...

  3. Cooter Country Music Festival

    Dust off your cowboy boots and hats â€” itâ€™s time for the Cooter Country Music Festival! Join us at Liberty Park on Saturday, October 4th for an evening filled with live country music, Southern charm, and small-town fun done right. Read on...

  4. Cootertober Kickoff - Diary of An Ozzman Live

    Cootertober is starting loud and legendary in Downtown Inverness! Join us on Wednesday, October 1st from 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM for a free live rock show featuring Diary of an Ozzman - Floridaâ€™s ultimate Ozzy Osbourne and Black Sabbath tribute band. Read on...

  5. Lewis and Young Entertainment Presents: Amy's Wish

    Lewis and Young Entertainment Presents: Amy's Wish live at the Valerie Theatre... Read on...

  6. Small Town Saturday Night Series

    Check Out Our Lineup for the Small Town Saturday Night Series! Save the dates for these upcoming concerts & experience the best of live music right here in Downtown Inverness! Read on...

  7. Create an Account

    With the MyAccount feature, you can customize your viewing experience, sign up for notifications, and engage in information you care about. Read on...

  8. Stay Connected!

    Notify Me allows you to subscribe to an unlimited number of email lists. Receive email or text message updates regarding the information you have requested. Read on...
